about_the_game:
Customize the 5 Season 1 DLC characters in Granblue Fantasy: Versus with new color variants. Unlocks color variants no.14-18 (5 per character, for a total of 25).

Set Contents
■Color variants no.14-18 for the following characters:
　Beelzebub
　Narmaya
　Soriz
　Djeeta
　Zooey

Notice:
In order to use this downloadable content, you will need the main product, which is sold separately. The latest content update may be required.

The color variants in this set are for the DLC characters. In order to use them, you need to unlock the characters by purchasing the GBVS Character Pass 1 or each character's GBVS Additional Character Set.

The color variants in this set aren't sold separately.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
